text: Indivisible () is a 2016 Italian drama film directed by Edoardo De Angelis. It premiered in the Venice Days section at the 73rd Venice International Film Festival and was later screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Angela Fontana as Daisy * Marianna Fontana as Viola * Massimiliano Rossi as Peppe * Antonia Truppo as Titti * Gianfranco Gallo as Don Salvatore * Toni Laudadio as Nunzio * Peppe Servillo as Alfonso Fasano * Antonio Pennarella as Salvo Coriace ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:Italian- language films Category:Films about twin sisters
title: Indivisible (2016 film)
